tag_list: mcgarrygadgets, mcg3, steve-mcgarry, innovation, entrepreneur, young-entrepreneur
overview:
At 20, Steve invented and patented his first invention which then in turn sparked his first startup company. McGarryGadGets commonly referred to as McG3 was launched in September 2012 after Steve graduated in December 2011 with an economics degree from East Carolina University and traveled the nation meeting with inventors just like himself. At the age of 24 he Steve has spawned 3 unique startups and has appeared on NBC’s Steve Harvey’s Top Inventors. People from around the world submit products to Steve McGarry everyday for the opportunity to be sold on his high profile e-commerce platform McG3. Steve claims that his motivation and entrepreneurial spirit will help change both the Intellectual property industry and the world as we know it.

“The people who are crazy enough to think they can change the world, are the people who do so.” -Steve Jobs
